## Dataset

[Yahoo Finance data](https://finance.yahoo.com/ )

## Objectives

* Download and clean the dataset
* Create a $i$-day lag variable, $i$ from $1$ to $N$, representing the stock price $i$-day ago.


|        | ... | 2024-03-25 (lag-2) | 2024-03-26 (lag-1) | 2024-03-27      |
|--------|-----|--------------------|--------------------|-----------------|
| Apple  |     | 170.85             | 169.71             | to be predicted |
| Amazon |     | 178.01             | 178.30             | to be predicted |
| ...    |     |                    |                    |                 |


* Decide the $N$
* Do a linear regression to predict the price.
* Do a variable selection using AIC, BIC, and $R^2$, compare the performance of those methods.
* Kmeans clustering for different stocks to group the similar stocks.
